#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>

int size;
inline int next(int prev){
	int ans=0;
	int to_be_and=1<<(size-1);
	if((prev&to_be_and)>0){
		if(prev%2==0)
			prev++;
		else
			prev--;
		prev=prev<<1;
		prev=prev&((to_be_and<<1)-1);
	}
	else{
		prev=prev<<1;
		prev=prev+1;
		
		prev=prev&((to_be_and<<1)-1);
	}
	return prev;
}
inline void print_num(int num){
		for(int i=0;i<size;i++){
		int temp=num;
		if((temp>>(size-1-i))%2)
			printf("+");
		else
			printf("-");
		}
		printf("\n");
		return;
}
int main(){
	int T;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	for(int j=1;j<=T;j++){
		printf("Experiment #%d:\n",j);
		int ops,offset=0,period=0;
		scanf("%d%d",&size,&ops);
		int mapper[20000]={0};
		int answers[20000]={0};
		for(int i=0;i<20000;i++)
			mapper[i]=-1;
		char temp[20];
		scanf(" %s",temp);
		for(int i=0;i<size;i++){
			char tt=temp[i];	
			if(tt=='+')
				answers[0]=(answers[0]<<1)+1;
			else
				answers[0]=(answers[0]<<1);
		}
		mapper[answers[0]]=0;
		for(int i=1;i<20000;i++){
			answers[i]=next(answers[i-1]);
			if(mapper[answers[i]]>=0){
				offset=mapper[answers[i]];
				period=i-mapper[answers[i]];
				break;
			}
			else{
				mapper[answers[i]]=i;
			}
			
		}
		offset=0;
		while(ops--){
			int cur;
			scanf("%d",&cur);
			if(size==1&&answers[0]==0&&cur==0){printf("-\n");continue;}
			   if(size==1)
                {printf("+\n");continue;}

			if(cur<=offset)
				print_num(answers[cur]);
			else
				print_num(offset+answers[(cur-offset)%period]);
		}
		
	}
	
	return 0;
}
